issue.message: The intent action `android.intent.action.MAIN (used to start an activity)` matches the intent filter of a non-exported component `com.wireguard.android.activity.LogViewerActivity` from a manifest. If you are trying to invoke this specific component via the action then you should make the intent explicit by calling `Intent.set{Component,Class,ClassName}`.

The intent action `android.intent.action.MAIN (used to start an activity)` matches the intent filter of a non-exported component `com.wireguard.android.activity.LogViewerActivity` from a manifest. If you are trying to invoke this specific component via the action then you should make the intent explicit by calling `Intent.set{Component,Class,ClassName}`.

The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.
